channel.title: Posts on Step by step
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Step by step

item.title: Generate seating charts in 5 minutes
item.description:
Software Download

I. Photo-taking

Let the students line up in order of school number, take photos in turn, and let them sit down and fill in the seating form in turn (only fill in the school number)

II. Package and upload to computer

Use WeChat to upload the packaged pictures to the computer and decompress them

III. batch rename serial number

Move the pictures to the img folder of the software directory and run the bat program

IV. fill out the form to generate the form

Follow the prompts to enter the information in turn, the location in accordance with the order of the seat form input, separated by spaces

V. Print or save the electronic version

Ctrl + p to pop up the print window

bilibili portal

github portal

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)

item.title: Android Phone Screen Casting Guide
item.description:
One, Download scrcpy and unzip

Click to download

Extract it to a stable and safe place where it will not be deleted by mistake, in this case: D:\scrcpy, make sure you can see scrcpy.exe after entering the directory

Two, Configure environment variables

This computer (Explorer) right-click Properties â†’ Advanced System Settings â†’ Environment Variables â†’ double-click Path in the top half of the pane â†’ New â†’ Browse â†’ select the (scrcpy.exe containing) folder you just unzipped â†’ OK â†’ OK â†’ OK

Three, Open phone developer mode

Find the phone information (including the phone model, chip information page), quickly and repeatedly click the version number until the prompt “You have entered the developer mode”, then return, find the developer mode â†’ USB debugging â†’ open â†’ (OK to open)

Four, Cast Screen

After connecting your phone to the computer with the data cable, open the computer terminal, enter scrcpy and enter, and confirm on your phone to see your phone screen on the computer screen.

item.title: how to batch remove the Chinese in the document
item.description:
1.

  1. open the document to be processed with word
  2. Ctrl+A select all documents
  3. Ctrl+H open the replace window ! Snipaste_20220322_172443.png
  4. Click More in the bottom left corner
  5. Make sure “Use wildcards” is checked
  6. Type [! ^1-^127] (English state input)
  7. Leave the Replace box blank
  8. Click “Replace all”

item.title: Archlinux Installation guide
item.description:
ä¸€ã€Download ISO image and tools

Download ISO image(archlinux-xxxx.xx.xx-x86_64.iso)

Download rufus(rufus-x.xp.exe)

Download ihasher

äºŒã€Create installation USB flash drive

Caution: The created installation USB drive will be formatted, all contents inside will be deleted!

If you are asked if you want to allow updates and confirm formatting the USB drive, click “Yes”.

ä¸‰ã€Reserved partitions

Press Windows+R and enter diskmgmt.msc

å››ã€Select UEFI mode and enter the u disk to install the system

Select UEFI mode to boot, it varies from computer to computer, please follow the computer manual or search online for this procedure.

Update system time

root@archiso ~ # timedatectl set-ntp true

Partition

root@archiso ~ # fdisk -l

Devices ending in rom, loop or airoot can be ignored in the result.

For a selected device, the following partitions are mandatory.

A root partition (mounted in the root directory)/

An EFI system partition

Please use fdisk or parted to modify the partition table. For example:

root@archiso ~ # fdisk /dev/the_disk_to_be_partitioned
Mount Points Partition Partition Type Recommended size
/mnt/boot /dev/efi_system_partition EFI System Partition At least 260 MiB
/mnt /dev/root_partition Linux x86-64 root_partition (/) Remaining space

Formatting partitions

root@archiso ~ # mkfs.ext4 /dev/root_partition
root@archiso ~ # mkfs.fat -F 32 /dev/efi_system_partition

Mount partitions

Mount the root volume to /mnt and the efi system volume to /mnt/boot

root@archiso ~ # mkdir /mnt/boot
root@archiso ~ # mount /dev/root_partition /mnt
root@archiso ~ # mount /dev/ /mnt/boot

Setting the mirror source

root@archiso ~ # reflector --country China --age 12 --protocol https --sort rate --save /etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist

Install the required packages

root@archiso ~ # pacstrap /mnt base linux linux-firmware

Configuration System

Fstab Generate the fstab file with the following command (set the UUID or volume label with the -U or -L option).

root@archiso ~ # genfstab -U /mnt >> /mnt/etc/fstab

It is highly recommended to check the generated /mnt/etc/fstab file after executing the above command to make sure it is correct.

Chroot

Enter your new system.

root@archiso ~ # arch-chroot /mnt
[root@archiso /]#

Timezone

[root@archiso /]# ln -sf /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Shanghai /etc/localtime
[root@archiso /]# hwclock --systohc

Set Locale

Edit /etc/locale.gen,and then uncomment en_US.UTF-8 UTF-8(delete #)ã€‚

[root@archiso /]# vim /etc/locale.gen
[root@archiso /]# locale-gen
[root@archiso /]# vim /etc/locale.conf
LANG=en_US.UTF-8

Network Configuration

Create hostname file:

/etc/hostname

myhostname(set your own hostname here)

Add the corresponding information to the hosts:

[root@archiso /]# vim /etc/hosts
127.0.0.1	localhost
::1		localhost
127.0.1.1	myhostname.localdomain	myhostname

set password for root

[root@archiso /]# passwd

Installation of boot, kernel, and networking related packages

[root@archiso /]# pacman -S grub efibootmgr intel-ucode os-prober wpa_supplicant dhcpcd

Configure refind boot

[root@archiso /]# pacman -S refind
[root@archiso /]# refind-install
[root@archiso /]# nano /boot/refind.conf


"Boot with standard options" "root-UUID-(root_partition_uuid) rw loglevel=3 quiet"
"Boot to single-user mode" "root-UUID-(root_partition_uuid) rw loglevel=3 quiet"
"Boot with minimal options" "ro root=/dew/(root_partition_path)"

Exit chroot

[root@archiso /]# exit
root@archiso ~ # umount -R /mnt

root@archiso ~ # reboot

[1]ArchWiki. Installation guide[EB/OL]. [2022-3-16]. https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Installation_guide.

item.title: Make your two-dimensional beauty map clearer
item.description:
We often encounter the problem that the picture is not clear enough when we preview the two-dimensional beauty map, and the quality of the picture is greatly reduced. Some people may know the tool waifu2x, but today I will introduce to you an artifact that is many times better than waifu2x-Real-CUGAN. The GitHub link is as follows: https://github.com/fumiama/Real-CUGAN

effect comparison

1. Install Python

Second, install the lib component library

1
2
3
4

pip3 install torch
pip3 install numpy
pip3 install opencv-python
pip3 install moviepy

3. Create a working directory and name the file

Create folders and files

1
2

git clone https://hub.fastgit.xyz/fumiama/Real-CUGAN-Server.git
cd Real-CUGAN-Server

Replace the input image file in the input_dir1 folder.

Four, call the command to process the picture

1

python3 upcunet_v3.py

The output images are in the opt-dir-all-test folder.

item.title: æè‡´ç¾åŒ–powershell
item.description:
I. Download the file and verify the integrity of the file

Click to download the new version of Powershell

Click to download Git

II. Installing Git

III. Install Nerd Font

Recommend JetBrainsMono Click to download After downloading and unpacking, select all ttf files, right click, install

IV. Install Windows Terminal Preview

Search for Windows Terminal Preview in the Windows App Store and install it.

V. Install the new version of Powershell

Just go all the way to the next step, it is recommended to install to Powershell folder in D drive.

VI. Install oh-my-posh

Click to download oh-my-posh

VII. Setting the font

VIII. Modify the terminal configuration
